text: Nawomi namugamba nti, “Mukama Katonda atalekanga kulaga kisa eri abalamu n’abafu, amuwe omukisa. Anti omusajja oyo muganda waffe ddala, era y’omu ku banunuzi2:20 Omununuzi, ye yali muganda w’omugenzi ow’ennyumba ow’okumpi ennyo, era ye yali ateekwa okununula ettaka lyonna ery’omugenzi. Omununuzi yali ateekwa okuwasa nnamwandu, nnamwandu bwe yabanga tazadde baana (Ma 25:5-10) baffe ddala.”
